_header: Who will with reason and right
_description: A rubric granting an indulgence for saying thirteen masses ‘for any dysess yat may ffall’ — eight couplets

Dunrobin.First Lines:
Quha wyl with reson ande rychtÞe mercy of god
                    almicht…
Dunrobin.Last Lines:
…Quhat tyme ȝe lykis in þe ȝheirÞir ar
                    þe messis folowandeAs latyn men may vndyrstande
Dunrobin.Editions:
Historical Manuscripts Commission, Second Report, with
                Appendix.
         (1874): 180.
